means: 用螺丝拧紧的，螺丝状的，喝醉的
用螺丝拧紧( screw的过去式和过去分词 )

sentence.Network_en: He screwed his face into an expression of mock pain.
He was really screwed up with his emotional problems.
sentence.Network_cn: 他深受情感问题的困扰。

sentence.Network_en: The consumer is getting screwed by cover charges as well.
sentence.Network_cn: 这名消费者也被诈取了服务费。

entry.def: A screw is a metal object similar to a nail, with a raised spiral line around it. You turn a screw using a screwdriver so that it goes through two things, for example two pieces of wood, and fastens them together.

example.ex: Each bracket is fixed to the wall with just three screws.
example.tran: 每个托架只用了 3 颗螺钉固定在墙上。

entry.def: If you screw something somewhere or if it screws somewhere, you fix it in place by means of a screw or screws.

example.ex: I had screwed the shelf on the wall myself...
example.tran: 我自己用螺钉把架子固定在墙上。
用螺钉固定住所有松动的地板。

entry.def: A screw lid or fitting is one that has a raised spiral line on the inside or outside of it, so that it can be fixed in place by twisting.

example.ex: ...an ordinary jam jar with a screw lid.
example.tran: 带螺旋盖的普通果酱罐

entry.def: If you screw something somewhere or if it screws somewhere, you fix it in place by twisting it round and round.

example.ex: Kelly screwed the silencer onto the pistol...
example.tran: 凯利把消音器拧到手枪上。

example.ex: Screw down the lid fairly tightly...

entry.tran: 把(纸等)揉成一团，拧成一团
entry.def: If you screw something such as a piece of paper into a ball, you squeeze it or twist it tightly so that it is in the shape of a ball.

example.ex: He screwed the paper into a ball and tossed it into the fire.
example.tran: 他把纸揉成一团抛进火里。

entry.def: If you screw your face or your eyes into a particular expression, you tighten the muscles of your face to form that expression, for example because you are in pain or because the light is too bright.

example.ex: He screwed his face into an expression of mock pain.

entry.def: If someone screws someone else or if two people screw, they have sex together.
Some people use screw in expressions such as screw you or screw that to show that they are not concerned about someone or something or that they feel contempt for them.
If someone says that they have been screwed, they mean that someone else has cheated them, especially by getting money from them dishonestly.

example.ex: They haven't given us accurate information. We've been screwed...
example.tran: 他们没有提供准确的消息。我们被骗了。

example.ex: The consumer is getting screwed by cover charges as well.
example.tran: 这名消费者也被诈取了服务费。

entry.def: If someone screws something, especially money, out of you, they get it from you by putting pressure on you.

example.ex: For decades rich nations have been screwing money out of poor nations.
example.tran: 富国压榨穷国长达数十载。

entry.def: Prisoners often refer to prison officers as screws .
A screw is a propeller on a ship or an aircraft.
If you turn or tighten the screw on someone, you increase the pressure which is already on them, for example by using threats, in order to force them to do a particular thing.

example.ex: Parisian taxi drivers are threatening to mount a blockade to turn the screw on the government.
example.tran: 巴黎出租车司机们正威胁阻塞交通以对政府进一步施压。

entry.tran: 愈逼愈紧的压力(或行动)
entry.def: You can refer to each of a series of threats or actions which are intended to force someone to do a particular thing as another turn of the screw .

example.ex: Every rebel raid is another turn of the screw, increasing the pressure on the President.
example.tran: 每次叛乱分子发动袭击就是又往前逼进了一步，使得总统的压力越来越大。

example.en: Our plans got all screwed up.
example.zh: 我们的计划全给打乱了。

list.explanation: 神经紧张的，受剌激的，神经质的

example.en: Hamlet was a sad,screwed up type guy.
example.zh: 哈姆雷特是个郁郁寡欢，精神受到刺激的典型人物。

auth_sentence.content: They've been screwed since the dawn of time.
auth_sentence.res_content: They've been screwed since the dawn of time.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: They've been screwed since the dawn of time.

auth_sentence.content: You are in there because you screwed up.
auth_sentence.res_content: You are in there because you screwed up.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: You are in there because you screwed up.

auth_sentence.content: Blackett screwed the top onto his hip flask.
auth_sentence.res_content: Blackett screwed the top onto his hip flask.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Blackett screwed the top onto his hip flask.
